definition: exhibiting or restored to vigorous good health, draw slowly or heavily
details:
adjective
- exhibiting or restored to vigorous good health
= example: exhibiting or restored to vigorous good health
= synonyms: whole
verb
- draw slowly or heavily
= synonyms: haul
- to cause to do through pressure or necessity, by physical, moral or intellectual means :'She forced him to take a job in the city'
= synonyms: pressure
